headings.usage: Use Light (300) for large display text, Black (900) for emphasis. Tight tracking.

body.usage: High legibility for data. Relaxed leading.

mono.usage: For confidence scores, coordinates, and IDs.

rules: Use 'Tinted Grey' rule: Neutral greys must have a hint of blue.

spacing.grid_gap: gap-8 to gap-12 for layout, gap-4 for data.

landing_page.rules: Asymmetry. Mix hero (col-span-8), square (col-span-4), and tall elements.

results_page.rules: Dense. Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms.

surfaces.cards: Grid Borders style. Visible skeleton. border-r border-b border-border/40.
surfaces.modals: Neumorphism (Clay & Crisp). Soft shadow + sharp 1px border.

rules: Use Shadcn for complex logic (Forms, Dialogs, Select).
Heavily customize Shadcn styles to match 'Clinical Precision' theme.
Use raw HTML/Tailwind for layout structures.

specifics.buttons: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-sm). Uppercase labels for primary actions.
specifics.inputs: High height (h-12). bg-subtle. Focus: ring-2 ring-primary/20.
specifics.cards: Flat, bordered, no shadow by default. Shadow on hover.

libraries.icons: Phosphor Icons (Regular weight for UI, Duotone for features).
libraries.maps: React Simple Maps or D3 for country visualization.

images.description: Lab test tubes, abstract, dark/blue tones. Use with overlay.
Particles sphere, AI/Data representation. Use in Hero section.
Scientist hands, precision work. Use for 'How it works' section.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page to avoid boredom.
Ensure the 'Search' component is the 'Godly' center of attention.
Use 'International Klein Blue' (#002FA7) for primary actions.
Do not use Inter font. Load Chivo and IBM Plex Sans.
Use 'Grid Borders' surface style for the results dashboard.
Follow the 'Anti-AI' persona: No generic gradients, no center-everything.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through z-index and layering.
No text-align: center on the App container.
Export components as named exports, pages as default exports.
